domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump The real shame is your inability to accept realities that don’t fit into your plans. This led to your incompetent response to racial unrest and covid19. You are spiraling down and on your way out, and just like Covid19 and social change, whether you accept it or not, it’s here.
